info.title: Redback's Report Factory
info.description: This is a class for getting specific reports for page reload and redirect.

method.name: getReportRedirect
method.description: Creates a specific action report to invoke a page redirect to the client.

parameter.name: $domain
parameter.description: The subdomain of the location. If left empty, the full url will be considered the first parameter, otherwise the url will be resolved to this subdomain. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $formSubmit
parameter.description: Indicates whether the report will contain a submit action for forms and allow to unload the form.

method.name: getReportReload
method.description: Creates a specific action report to invoke a page reload to the client.

parameter.name: $formSubmit
parameter.description: Indicates whether the report will contain a submit action for forms and allow to unload the form.
